settings.content: Selecting any of the options available will require to upload the respective SVG into Files on and paste the SVG URL on Extra Icons dropdown in Theme Settings.
To color the svg arrows use the color pickers below and replace the fill attribute with the following format: var(--icon-{prev or next}-color-{1,2 or 3}). Hover color will be replaced automatically.
To color the bullets use the color pickers below.
